application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details of conditions 11, 12 and 13 pursuant to planning permission reference 21/0130/VAROPDC dated 26/08/2022 for Secton 73 application to varty condition 1 (approved plans) of planning permission 19/0104/VAROPDC for a section 73 application to vary conditions 1 (approved plans) A (building hieights) and B (floorspace) of planning permission 17/0055/FUMOPDC for the demolition of existing buildings and structures and the redevelopment of the site to provide two new buildings comprising ground floor flexible non-residential floorspace (Use Classes A1/A2/A3/A4/B1/D1/D2) ground floor workspace (Use Class B1/Artist Studios) and residential units (Use Class C3) with disabled car parking, plant space, amenity space, landscaping and associated works to increase the number of affordable housing units and make minor changes to the external appearance including reducing the height of the tower
